name: InterContinental Dhaka, an IHG Hotel
title: History, luxury and rebirth: Hotel Intercontinental Dhaka's evolution ...
desc: An 8-minute walk from the Bangladesh National Museum, this high-end hotel next to Ramna Park is 3 km from the unfinished Lalbagh Fort and 15 km from Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport.

name: Holiday Inn
title: Set 5 km from the Bangladesh National Museum.
desc: Set 5 km from the Bangladesh National Museum, this polished hotel on a major thoroughfare is 6 km from Laibagh Fort and 12 km from Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport.

name: Renaissance Dhaka Gulshan Hotel
title: Sleek quarters in an upscale property featuring 3 restaurants
desc: Off a road lined with trees, this polished, upscale hotel is 9 km from both Baitul Mukarram National Mosque and the Bangladesh National Museum. It’s also 11 km from Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport.

name: Pan Pacific Sonargaon Dhaka
title: Understated quarters in a refined hotel with international eateries, chic bars & an outdoor pool.
desc: This refined hotel in a lush garden setting is 2 km from the Bangladesh National Museum and 3 km from Jatiyo Sangsad Bhaban, the Bangladesh National Parliament.
